interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Shampoo with Natural Essential Oils for Moisturizing Skin & Hair, 8.5 oz. Review Date: 2020/09/02 Store: Mr. Pristine Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mr. Pristine', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Peppermint', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '5.21 x 2.8 x 2.3 inches; 7.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '627843801832', 'Manufacturer': 'Mr. Pristine'} Review Text: • Lathers really well
• Has a light mint smell
• Leaves your beard feeling nice and clean afterwards

Got for my husband as he is moving into grooming and managing his growing beard. He has told me that he really likes the way this shampoo cleans his beard and the fact that it lathers well without having to apply much product which for me is a win cuz that means less money spent in the long run. Overall he has def enjoyed using this product and we're still gauging if this is something we would repurchase but if we did it would def be because it's long lasting. Review Title: Pretty decent shampoo Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
lorelo 20 pieces Hair Curlers, Hair Rollers Spiral Curls Styling Kit No Heat Hair Curlers with Styling Hooks for Girls Woman lorelo {'Number of Items': '20', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'Lorelo', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '10.59 x 9.02 x 2.8 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '619156721396'} I choose these because I've seen these before product curls without the heat and it was as simple as applying them and letting your hair air dry. Well let me tell you it takes alot of practice and patience and knowing what your doing. Is it simple enough to understand, yes. However the sectioning hair, getting tangled, knotted or stuck was alot of the problems I ran into. If my husband had not been home I think I might have been in some real trouble. I'm not mild tempered and almost was pulling my hair out trying to get it unstuck at some points. I will say there were times when I got a rhythm going and I was getting my hair to go thru effortlessly but in the end once I was done I found pieces that weren't even in there and it was uncomfortable to wear unless maybe I was up doing stuff around the house. In the end I took it down and I'd had enough of the torture these provided. Overall would I suggest these yes to someone a little more familiar with there head and maybe to do in my daughter's hair but personally unless it's a day I'm bored and nothing else to do I may give it a go again. I will say my husband did see some curls in my hair when I ended up taking them out they didn't stay that way but he said he could see results and that was just in a matter of getting them all in. There may be potential there just not patience in my book. Takes time and patience Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Shampoo with Natural Essential Oils for Moisturizing Skin & Hair, 8.5 oz. Mr. Pristine {'Brand': 'Mr. Pristine', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Peppermint', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '5.21 x 2.8 x 2.3 inches; 7.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '627843801832', 'Manufacturer': 'Mr. Pristine'} • Lathers really well
• Has a light mint smell
• Leaves your beard feeling nice and clean afterwards

Got for my husband as he is moving into grooming and managing his growing beard. He has told me that he really likes the way this shampoo cleans his beard and the fact that it lathers well without having to apply much product which for me is a win cuz that means less money spent in the long run. Overall he has def enjoyed using this product and we're still gauging if this is something we would repurchase but if we did it would def be because it's long lasting. Pretty decent shampoo
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Preferences:** Continues to enjoy experimenting with hair styling tools that do not use heat, seeking convenience and ease of use. The user also values products that are effective in grooming and maintenance, as evidenced by recent purchases for favorite family members, indicating a broader interest in self-care and grooming products.

- **Behavior Patterns:** Shows resilience and a willingness to learn from challenges, whether in styling techniques or grooming routines. Demonstrates resourcefulness when selecting products, opting for those that provide good value and efficacy, suggesting a strategic approach to purchases.

- **Personality Traits:** Although the user may feel frustrated with complex processes, they possess a playful side and engage happily in styling activities with family. Their thoughtful purchasing for others reveals a nurturing aspect, as well as an appreciation for quality and practicality in grooming solutions.

- **Overall Impression:** The user is open to trying new grooming and styling products while recognizing the importance of outcomes. They value effectiveness, budget-friendliness, and enjoyment in both family interactions and personal care routines. Overall, they maintain a balanced perspective towards beauty and grooming, driven by a blend of practicality and fun.
